teamDescription: Our team consists of creative, inventive people. Despite the fact that we are different, we still love coding, taking challenges, learning something new and creating high-quality web-sites. Under the guidance of a great teacher Sergey we worked on this project.
courseDescription: Rolling Scopes School provides a special free-of-charge course about react. It is opened to everyone, who has experience in JavaScript, HTML, CSS. After accomplishing an education, students receive an electronic certificate of completion
